ygData.subject: Re: Equipment Check
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I have a mino axe, FS 2-handed sword, conjured hammer of wrath - I usually carry all three, along with my shiny brass shield, using the mino axe/shiny
ygData.messageBody:
> 1) I have both a mino axe and a FS longsword which should I be using?

I have a mino axe, FS 2-handed sword, conjured hammer of wrath - I usually
carry all three, along with my shiny brass shield, using the mino axe/shiny
brass shield for day-to-day work, hammer/shield combo for magic-only creatures,
and whippin' out the 2-hander whenever I get the itch to see big numbers roll
across the screen!

> 2) Considering the above weapons what is the next step up in weapons?

I was considering a combine longsword until I got my hammer of wrath, now I'm
not real clear on what the next logical upgrade is for the 1-handed/shield
combo. If it's two-handed, then I'd say a bone-bladed claymore or the shiny
brass halberd, but I don't have an answer for the 1-hander - anyone?

> 3) How much should I except to pay to jump up to the weapon suggested in
> question 2?

I'm on a shoestring budget myself, and given that the mino axe was 5pp, the
shield was 10pp, and the FS 2-hander was 15pp, I'd expect to spend about 30pp,
but again I don't know what's out there for 30pp. If I did, I'd have bought one
already :)

> 4) Taking into account that I am currently level 16(bubble from 17th) and I
> currently have:
> 2 Onyx Earrings
> Spiked Leather Collar
> Leather Mask
> Small Ringmail Helm
> 2 Silver Amber Rings (+2 str)
> Banded Arms
> Leather Gloves
> 2 Banded Bracers
> Leather Shoulderpads
> Bronze Breastplate
> Bronze Cloak
> Bronze Leggings
> Leather Belt
> Banded Boots
> Shiny Brass Shield
> Am I at where most paladins (untwinked) at this level?

Okay, I just hit lvl 16 a couple days ago, here's my equipment list:
No earrings
banded collar
leather mask
small banded helm
2 dervish cutthroat rings (+1ac, +2dex)
banded arms
leather gloves
2 banded bracers
leather shoulderpads
banded tunic
banded cloak
patchwork leggings
banded belt
patchwork boots
Shiny Brass Shield
At a glance, I'd say we were quite evenly matched indeed. I want to replace my
patchwork and leather with bronze, but I'm taking my own sweet time about it
and doing it one piece at a time.

> 5) What types of armor should I be looking for?

I'm starting to look for armor that gives equal or better protection than
banded, and gives some sort of strength or stength/wisdom bonus. If it's just
not available, then I'm replacing the patchwork and leather with bronze.

> 6) How much does a BS mantle sell for ?

I have no idea.

> 7) Anyone on Cazic Thule they would like to sell?

I play on Tunare

> Well that is alot for this time. Thanks for your advice in advance.
>
> Silvermyst

Keep the faith strong, Silvermyst - rest assured that your character is right
on task, and I'd fight beside you any day.

Kaladin, One small Dwarf in One big world
